channel.title: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice
channel.description: I empower reaped King who was guarded by Knight and King didn't get reaped. Is this a bug or a feature? I lost 3 souls so it seems I deserve to get something out of it.

item.title: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Exactly. Don’t underestimate the knights.

Read full topic
item.source: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice

item.title: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
So I lost 3 souls just to make a knight lose his armor? In other words the empower wasted 2 souls for nothing

Read full topic
item.source: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice

item.title: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
How it works is you empower reap your target. The Knight guards your target. Knight prevents the attack and kills you. You die but consume a soul to revive yourself. He kills himself. If it is still active he survives killing himself due to armored.

Read full topic
item.source: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice

item.title: Empower Reap doesn't bypass Knight Sacrifice
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
So Reaper empower reaps Knight if Knight guards the Reaper’s target? I’m not sure whether the Knight got reaped but if that’s how it’s supposed to work I guess he did

Read full topic
